attributes.action: Write off Student debt and scap charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government can find £50bn to support debt riddled financial 'insitutions' billions more to fund illegal warfare but paying to put our own young people through university is a no no. Priorities are the issue, this government has failed to establish them effectively in these areas

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
